subs.text: Wearing a mask is like not taking a shit in public, but worse, because the shit won't give people a horrible disease for the rest of their lives. How hard is that to understand?
That feeling when I take a guess at how something complicated might work, just to get something started that I can debug, only to find it works without any problems as-is.
I don't guess at Wordle. I have an algorithm. But then I'm a programmer, so what did you expect? :smile:
